tell me which partition your /boot directory is in. /dev/hdb1?
/boot is on /dev/hdb1, witch is currently mounted in /mnt/linux/ on the live-cd.

I suggest the following procedure: 'umount /mnt/linux && sudo grub', then type 'root (hd1,0)' and 'setup (hd0)' and 'quit'. If your (/mnt/linux)/boot/grub/menu.lst is okay, it should then boot successfully from the HD.
